summary: REQ-22/23/24 appear implemented: CrashPromptDialog is now globally mounted in the app Layout; useCrashDetection is permission- and setting-gated with a confirmation window and cooldown; Settings store and page wiring show crashThreshold support with a clamped safe range. Some additional Settings/UI behavior was introduced that was not requested (platform limitations copy, cache clear, threshold clamping).

hallucinated_features.description: Added a general "Platform Limitations" disclaimer block in Settings with multiple bullet points unrelated to crash detection attachment/fix/sensitivity.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on attaching crash prompt globally, improving crash detection behavior, and adding a crash threshold sensitivity control; it does not request new platform limitation messaging.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a "Clear cache" action that clears localStorage/sessionStorage and shows a toast.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-22/23/24; could affect offline/settings behavior beyond the crash detection scope.
